assetProfile.address1: 360 Mall - Sixth Ring Road, South Surra
assetProfile.address2: Al Zhara Area, Third & Fourth Floor
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Tamdeen Investment Company - KSCP is a principal investment firm specializing in management of financial investment transactions related to securities, including the acquisition and sale of private sector shares and bonds. The firm prefers to invest in financial, energy, and real estate sectors. It considers investments in Kuwait, Middle East and GCC countries. The firm also provides guidance and advice in various aspects of mergers, acquisitions, and leveraged buyouts and restructurings; investigates and provides reports to management regarding companies potential acquisitions, sale, or mergers; engages in the valuation of assets, divisions, and companies along with appraisal of major capital investment decision; and advices and assists clients on raising finance, as well as offers private placement and underwriting services for various projects. In addition, it provides asset management services, including custodial and trading services; and is involved in general trading and contracting, real estate, and consulting businesses. Tamdeen Investment Company  KSCP was founded in 1997 and is based in Kuwait, Kuwait.
